description: This Java class defines a data transfer object (DTO) for creating a Note, including validation annotations for 'title' and 'content' fields, constructors, getters, and setters.

classes.name: NoteCreateRequest
classes.description: DTO for creating a Note message with validation constraints, constructors, and accessor methods.

methods.name: getTitle
methods.description: Returns the title of the note.

methods.name: setTitle
methods.description: Sets the title of the note, returns the object for method chaining.

methods.name: getContent
methods.description: Returns the content of the note.

methods.name: setContent
methods.description: Sets the content of the note, returns the object for method chaining.
